lead_paragraph: Ettore Messina had a simple goal when he took over the San Antonio Spurs for two games while coach Gregg Popovich stayed home to tend to a family matter.

headline.print_headline: Aldridge Scores 29, Spurs Bounce Back With Win Over Wolves
headline.main: Aldridge Scores 29, Spurs Bounce Back With Win Over Wolves
